mapper.sql: cca.issuing_certificates_file_name, cca.buy_certificate_file_name, cca.creator_id, cca.updated_id, cca.created_time, cca.updated_time, cca.id, cca.carbon_project_id, cca.carbon_exchange_id, cca.certified_agency, cca.issuing_agency, cca.issuing_certificates, cca.issuing_date, cca.expiry_date, cca.assets_status, cca.transaction_status, cca.buy_total_price, cca.buy_unit_price, cca.buy_date, cca.buy_certificate, cca.total, cca.available_amount, cca.frozen_amount, cca.locked_amount, cca.valuation, cca.tenant_id
mapper.select: select , ce.name carbonExchangeName, ce.website carbonExchangeWebsite, cmp.project_introduction, cml.name carbonMethodologyName, cml.certification_criteria, cmr.project_name, cmr.project_scope_code, cmr.project_industry_code, cmr.project_scope_type_code, cmr.project_scope_type from carbon_credit_assets cca left join carbon_exchange ce on ce.id = cca.carbon_exchange_id left join carbon_metaregistry_project cmp on cmp.id = cca.carbon_project_id left join carbon_metaregistry cmr on cmr.id = cmp.metaregistry_id left join carbon_methodology cml on cml.dict_code = cmr.methodology_code where cca.id = #{id}
select sum(cca.total) total, sum(cca.available_amount) availableAmount, sum(cca.frozen_amount) frozenAmount, sum(cca.locked_amount) lockedAmount from carbon_credit_assets cca
